article.abstract: We present a method for automaticcategorization of author gender vian-gram analysis. Using a corpusof British student essays, experi-ments using character-level, word-level, and part-of-speech n-grams areperformed. The peak accuracy for allmethods is roughly equal, reaching amaximum of 8
